name: Fried Cod
description: Cod fried with a breadcrumb crust on one side and finished in the oven.
ingredients:
4 cod fillets
salt and pepper
1/2 cup flour
1 egg
1 1/2 cups breadcrumbs
 3 tbsp oil, lemon wedges, 
tartar sauce
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 300F, 
2. Pat fish dry with paper towels.
3. Season with salt & pepper.
4. Place flour, beaten egg, and breadcrumbs in 3 shallow bowls or plates.
5. Season each bowl with salt and pepper.
6. Take 1 piece of cod and dip, presentation side down, in the flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs. Press down firmly to get a think layer of breadcrumbs to stick.
7. Place prepared fish bread-side-up on a clean plate while you prepare the other pieces.
8. Heat oil in a large non-stick pan. 
9. Add fish, bread side down and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes.
10. Carefully flip fish and transfer to the oven. Book until cooked through, about 5 minutes.
11. Serve immediately with lemon wedges and/or tartar sauce.
